summary: The diff focuses on frontend startup/performance stabilization (lazy loading, conditional startup queries, reduced retries) and adds a mainnet deployment runbook plus a production deployment logs template. However, it does not provide evidence of an actual successful mainnet deployment, completion of the post-deploy verification checklist, or populated deployment logs with commands/output and final canister IDs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a production (Internet Computer mainnet) deployment for Version 16 so the application is reachable and usable on the production URL, including deploying/upgrading both backend and frontend canisters as needed.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains documentation/runbooks and frontend changes, but no evidence of an executed mainnet deployment, no backend/frontend canister install/upgrade results, and no production URL/canister IDs demonstrating the app is live.

missing_requirements.requirement: Run and confirm the production verification checklist in frontend/PRODUCTION_STABILIZATION.md after deployment (unauthenticated initial-load behavior and post-login startup behavior).
missing_requirements.reason: The stabilization doc included is largely explanatory (issues/root causes/changes) and is truncated; the diff does not show completed/confirmed checklist results or recorded verification outcomes after an actual deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: If deployment fails or requires retries, document the exact deploy command used, full deploy output/error logs, and final backend/frontend canister IDs in frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_LOGS.md.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_LOGS.md appears to be a template with placeholders and does not include the actual deploy command, full output/error logs, or final backend/frontend canister IDs.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a standalone mainnet deployment runbook markdown file for Version 16.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-33/34/35 request deployment, verification, and logging, but do not explicitly request creation of an additional runbook file; this is extra implementation/documentation beyond the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented frontend startup/performance changes (lazy-loaded dashboards, conditional startup guard execution, reduced React Query retries/behavior adjustments).
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirements are about production deployment, verification, and deployment logging; these code changes may help satisfy acceptance criteria (avoid prolonged loading), but they are not explicitly requested as deliverables in REQ-33/34/35.
